text: Ara smarana karo! Amara phiris‌tadera balalama -- ''adamera prati sijada karo’’, takhana tara sijada karala, ibalisa byatita. Se chila jinadera madhyekara, kaje'i se tara prabhura adesera abadhyacarana karechila. Tabe ki tomara amake chere diye take o tara bansadharake abhibhabakarupe grahana karabe, athaca tara to tomadera satru? An'yayakaridera jan'ya e'i binimaya kata nikrsta
